00019 int fromsock, tosock;     //fds for fifos
00020 
00021 int listenForSRR(SockRequestResponse &s, int timeout) {
00022   fd_set read_fds;
00023   int rc, maxfd;
00024   struct timeval tv;
00025 
00026   tv.tv_sec = timeout;
00027   tv.tv_usec = 0;
00028 
00029   FD_ZERO(&read_fds);
00030   FD_SET(fromsock, &read_fds);
00031   maxfd = fromsock;
00032 
00033   rc = select(maxfd+1, &read_fds, 0, 0, &tv);
00034   if (rc<0) {
00035     if (errno!=EINTR);
00036     return -1;
00037   }
00038   else if (rc==0)
00039     return 0;
00040   else if (FD_ISSET(fromsock, &read_fds)) {
00041     s.Unserialize(fromsock);
00042     return 1;
00043   }
00044   return -1;
00045 }

00047 void buildSRR(SockRequestResponse &s) {
